channel.title: Witch's Potion Dialogue

item.title: Witch's Potion Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @XenoForce XenoForce
item.description:
@XenoForce wrote:

[quote=“whackatre, post:6, topic:436036”][quote author=XenoForce link=topic=538760.msg3942571#msg3942571 date=1331524567]

No need to make a new topic, just add it with your other one.
And explain, this is a snippet not a tutorial
it’s not even a snippet

Actually it is… i told them where to add it that it nuff said’

When you showed what all had to be added and where to make the quest working fully + explaining the code
then it would be a tutorial

Sorry that I’m not perfect… but i dont do the original code people will leech, so i give them 1/5 of what they need
[/quote]

I personally think that if you’re going to give them a snippet, at least include the entire completed code.[/quote]
Well i would but, thats what im doing with my server atm, so i dont want to release everything

Read full topic

item.title: Witch's Potion Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @XenoForce XenoForce
item.description:
@XenoForce wrote:

Here is the Dialogue for Witch’s Potion Free to Play quest…
Add into DialogueHandler class
[size=10pt]Don’t Flame[/size]

case 50: sendNpcChat1("What could you want with an old woman like me?", 278, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 51; break; case 51: sendPlayerChat4("I' am in, search of a quest."); c.nextChat = 52; break; case 52: sendNpcChat1("Hmmm... Maybe i can shink of something for you.", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 53; break; case 53: sendNpcChat1("Would you like to become proficient in the dark arts?", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 54; break; case 54: sendPlayerChat4("Yes help me become one with my darker side." c.nextChat = 55; break; case 55: sendNpcChat1("Ok, I'm going to make a potion to help bring our your darker self.", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 56; break; case 56: sendNpcChat1("You will need certain ingredients.", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 57; break; case 57: sendPlayerChat4("What do i need?"); c.nextChat = 58; break; case 58: sendNpcChat1("You need an eye of newt, a rat's tail, and onion... Oh and a peice of burnt meat.", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 59; break; case 59: sendPlayerChat4("Okay, I'll go get them."); c.nextChat = -1; break; case 60: sendNpcChat1("So have you found the things for the potion?", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 61; break; case 61: sendOptionChat2("Yes I have Everything!", "No I haven't."); c.nextChat = 62; break; case 62: sendNpcChat1("Excellent, can I have them?", 307, "Hetty"); c.nextChat = 63; break; case 63: sendPlayerChat4("Well, is it ready?"); c.nextChat = 64; break; case 64: sendNpcChat("Yes, Now drink the Cauldron.", 307, "Hetty"); c.getXP(6, 5000) c.nextChat = -1; break;

The rest can be solved by converting Tyb97’s Cook Assistant
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,524212.msg3814543.html#msg3814543

Read full topic
